page.title: 16The Steyning Fire Service
page.content: The earliest{fire station}in Steyning was under the{clock tower.}It had a horse drawn cart.The horses were kept at the{White Horse Pub}and when the fire siren which was the{gas works {whistle}went off they galloped down to the clock tower to be hitched up.The {fire station}in Steyning now consists of 1 engine and 10 retained fire men. The fire service in West Sussex consists of 28 stations,only 7 stations are manned 24hrs a day,2 stations are manned 12hrs a day,19 retained like Steyning.{Fire Control is at Chichester where all 999 calls go.
